articles.title: 'This team looks broken and shattered': Akhtar believes Kohli resigning has affected India, says 'I see a lot of unrest' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli's decision to step down as India's Test captain came as a surprise to many, with several former cricketers expressing their desire to see him carry on for maybe another couple of years. But Akhtar, who foresaw this decision coming, remains an exce…
articles.content: Former Pakistan pacer Shoaib Akhtar has made a startling revelation, saying that he was informed by a few Indian journalists about Virat Kohli's impending decision to step down as Test captain. Kohli… [+2505 chars]
